Strings.Allow remote companions to make comment: Allow remote companions to make comments on dialog you are having.
Strings.Only use when Friendship is Magic doesn: Only use when Friendship is Magic doesn't work, and then turn off immediately after. Can  otherwise break your save
Strings.<b><color=magenta>Note </color></b><b><c: Note ToyBox was designed to offer the best user experience at widths of 1920 or higher. Please consider increasing your resolution up of at least 1920x1080 (ideally 4k) and go to Unity Mod Manager 'Settings' tab to change the mod window width to at least 1920. Increasing the UI scale is nice too when running at 4k
Strings.<b><color=orange>character(s) can be </c: character(s) can be Respecced. Pressing Respec will close the mod window and take you to character level up
Strings.<b><color=orange>None</color></b><color=: None - please progress further into the game
Strings.<b><color=orange>Note:</color></b><color: Note:This Unfair difficulty was bugged and applied the intended difficulty modifers twice. ToyBox allows you to keep playing at this Brutal difficulty level and beyond. Use the slider below to select your desired Brutality Level
Strings.<b><color=orange>Note</color></b><color=: Note this is a new and exciting feature that allows you to see for the first time the structure and some basic relationships of Etudes and other Elements that control the progression of your game story. Etudes are hierarchical in structure and additionally contain a set of Elements that can both conditions to check and actions to execute when the etude is started. As you browe you will notice there is a disclosure triangle next to the name which will show the children of the Etude. Etudes that have Elements will offer a second disclosure triangle next to the status that will show them to you.
Strings.<b><color=yellow>\nNote:</color></b><col: Note: This applies only to the current save.
Strings.<b><color=yellow>BACK UP</color></b><col: BACK UP before playing with this feature.You will lose your mythic ranks but you can restore them in this Party Editor.
Strings.<b><color=yellow>WARNING</color></b><col: WARNING The Respec UI is Non Interruptable please save before using
WARNING these features are EXPERIMENTAL and uses unreleased and likely buggy code.
WARNING this tool can both miraculously fix your broken progression or it can break it even further. Save and back up your save before using.
Strings.<color=#00ff00ff>creation of </color>new: creation of new characters Note: This value applies to all saves and in the main menu
Strings.<color=#00ff00ff>Some responses such as: Some responses such as comments about your mythic powers will always choose the first one by default. This allows the game to mix things up a bit Warning: this will introduce randomness to NPC responses to you in general and may lead to surprising or even wild outcomes
Strings.<color=#00ff00ff>Tells the game to reset: <color=#00ff00ff>Tells the game to reset the in game UI.</color><color=yellow> Warning</color><color=orange> Using this in dialog or the book will dismiss that dialog which may break progress so use with care</color>
Strings.<color=#00ff00ff>The following modifiers: <color=#00ff00ff>The following modifiers all work on </color><color=yellow>chance = chance (1 + modifier) </color><color=#00ff00ff>so a value of </color><color=yellow>-1</color><color=#00ff00ff> means the chance is 0, </color><color=yellow>0</color><color=#00ff00ff> is chance cost and </color><color=yellow>2</color><color=#00ff00ff> increases it 3x</color>

<color=#00ff00ff>The following modifiers all work on </color><color=yellow>cost = cost (1 + modifier) </color><color=#00ff00ff>so a value of </color><color=yellow>-1</color><color=#00ff00ff> means the cost is free, </color><color=yellow>0</color><color=#00ff00ff> is normal cost and </color><color=yellow>2</color><color=#00ff00ff> increases it 3x</color>
Strings.<color=#00ff00ff>the following options a:
<color=#00ff00ff>the following options allow you to migrate previous settings that were stored in toybox to the new per setting save mechanism for </color><color=cyan>Multi-class selections, Gestalt Flags and Allow Levels Past 20 </color><color=orange>
Note:</color><color=#00ff00ff>you may have configured this for a different save so use care in doing this migration</color>
Strings.<color=#00ff00ff>This allows you to loot: This allows you to loot items that are locked such as items carried by certain NPCs and items locked on your characters WARNING: This may affect story progression (e.g. your purple knife)
Strings.<color=#00ff00ff>This makes loot functio: <color=#00ff00ff>This makes loot function like Diablo or Borderlands. <color=orange>Note: turning this off requires you to save and reload for it to take effect.</color></color>
Strings.<color=#00ff00ff>toggle this if you want: <color=#00ff00ff>toggle this if you want show older ToyBox settings for </color><color=cyan>Multi-class selections, Gestalt Flags and Allow Levels Past 20 </color>
Strings.<color=#FF4040FF>Warning: </color> Only: <color=#FF4040FF>Warning: </color> Only use when Friendship is Magic doesn't work, and then turn off immediately after. Can otherwise break your save
Strings.<color=cyan> + Click</color> To Use Item: <color=cyan> + Click</color> To Use Items In Inventory
Strings.<color=cyan>Experimental</color><color=#: <color=cyan>Experimental</color><color=#00ff00ff>: in addition to regular leveling, this allows you to choose any mythic class each time you level up starting from mythic rank 1. This may have interesting and unexpected effects. Backup early and often...</color>
<color=cyan>Experimental</color><color=#00ff00ff>: lets you select any feat ignoring prerequisites.</color>
Strings.<color=cyan>Sandal</color><color=#00ff00: <color=cyan>Sandal</color><color=#00ff00ff> has discovered the mythic path of Trickster and can reveal hidden secrets in your items</color>
Strings.<color=orange>Experimental</color> Allow: <color=orange>Experimental</color> Allow remote companions to make comments on dialog you are having.
Strings.<color=orange>Experimental</color> your: <color=orange>Experimental</color> your friends forgive even your most vile choices.
Strings.<color=orange>If you want to alter defau: If you want to alter default character level mark classes you want to exclude from the calculation with gestalt which means those levels were added for multi-classing. See the link for more information on this campaign variant.
Strings.<color=orange>Note:</color><color=#00ff0: <color=orange>Note:</color><color=#00ff00ff> For cutscenes and some situations the rotation keys are disabled so you have to hold down Mouse3 to drag in order to get rotation</color>
Strings.Achievements not available until you loa: Achievements not available until you load a save.
Strings.Add new units in friendly armies to Merc: Add new units in friendly armies to Mercenary Pool if not Recruitable.
Strings.Adds a search field to Load/Save screen: Adds a search field to Load/Save screen (in game only)
Strings.Adds all currently active friendly units: Adds all currently active friendly units that are neither recruitable nor Mercanries to Mercenary units.
Strings.Adjusts costs of hiring mercenaries at t: Adjusts costs of hiring mercenaries at the Pathfinder vendor
Strings.Adjusts the movement speed of your party: Adjusts the movement speed of your party in area maps
Adjusts the movement speed of your party on world maps
Strings.After creating a metamagic spell, switch: After creating a metamagic spell, switch to the metamagic tab

Strings.Allow Mass Loot to steal from living NPC: Allow Mass Loot to steal from living NPCs
Strings.Allow Multiple Archetypes When Selecting: Allow Multiple Archetypes When Selecting A New Class
Strings.Allow Pets to Take Mythic Classes: Allow Pets to Take Mythic Classes

Strings.Applies the regular recruits growth dire: Applies the regular recruits growth directly.
Strings.Apply Feature Selection Multiplier to pa: Apply Feature Selection Multiplier to party members
Strings.Auto Follow While Holding Camera Follow: Auto Follow While Holding Camera Follow Key
Strings.Auto load Last Save on launch: Auto load Last Save on launch

Strings.Bindable hot key to swap between main an: Bindable hot key to swap between main and alternate time scale multipliers
Strings.Change the party without advancing time: Change the party without advancing time (good to bind)

Strings.Configure multiclass classes and gestalt: Configure multiclass classes and gestalt flags to use during

Strings.Demon: Auto Start Rage When Entering Com: Demon: Auto Start Rage When Entering Combat
Strings.Disable Armor & Shield Arcane Spell Fail: Disable Armor & Shield Arcane Spell Failure
Strings.Display guids in most tooltips, use shif: Display guids in most tooltips, use shift + left click on items/abilities to copy guid to clipboard
Strings.Draws dialog choices that you have previ: Draws dialog choices that you have previously selected in smaller type
Strings.due to existing archetype, %, this multi: due to existing archetype, %, this multiclass option will only be applied during respec.
Strings.due to existing class, %, this multiclas: due to existing class, %, this multiclass option will only be applied during respec.

Strings.Enable Zoom on all maps and cutscenes: Enable Zoom on all maps and cutscenes
Strings.Enduring Spells time needed for extensio: Enduring Spells time needed for extension
Strings.Enterint a Trap Zone while having Traps: Enterint a Trap Zone while having Traps disabled will prevent that Trap from triggering even if you deactivate this option in the future
Strings.Exceptions to Buff Duration Multiplier (: Exceptions to Buff Duration Multiplier (Advanced; will cause blueprints to load)
Strings.Expand Dialog To Include Remote Companio: Expand Dialog To Include Remote Companions
Strings.Experimental - See 'Level Up + Multiclas: Experimental - See 'Level Up + Multiclass' for more options and info
Strings.Experimental - this sets a mask on your: Experimental - this sets a mask on your alignment shifts. Warning: Using this may change your alignment.
Strings.Experimental - With this enabled you can: Experimental - With this enabled you can configure characters in the Party Editor to gain levels in additional classes whenever they level up. See the link for more information on this campaign variant.
Strings.Game Over Fix For <color=#FF6060FF>LEEER: Game Over Fix For <color=#FF6060FF>LEEEROOOOOOOYYY JEEEENKINS!!!</color> omg he just ran in!
Strings.Give the search bar focus when opening t: Give the search bar focus when opening the spellbook screen
Strings.good for larger group or to reduce enemi: good for larger group or to reduce enemies
Strings.Greater Enduring Spells time needed for: Greater Enduring Spells time needed for extension
Strings.Head: Head
Strings.Here you can choose which Search filters: Here you can choose which Search filters appear in the popup menu
Here you can choose which Search filters appear in the spellbook search popup menu
Strings.Here you can choose which Sort Options a: Here you can choose which Sort Options appear in the popup menu
Strings.Hold down shift during launch to bypass: Hold down shift during launch to bypass
Strings.If ticked, this will <b><color=#C04040E0: If ticked, this will MURDER all who dare to engage you!
Strings.If you tick this you can click on equipm: If you tick this you can click on equipment slots to filter the inventory for items that fit in it. For more Enhanced Inventory and Spellbook check out the Loot & Spellbook Tab
Strings.Ignore Alignment When Choosing A Class: Ignore Alignment When Choosing A Class
Strings.Ignore Caster Type And Spell Level Restr: Ignore Caster Type And Spell Level Restrictions
Strings.Ignore Prerequisite Features (like Race): Ignore Prerequisite Features (like Race) when choosing Class
Strings.Ignore Prerequisites When Choosing A Fea: Ignore Prerequisites When Choosing A Feat
Strings.Import/Export allows you to save and add: Import/Export allows you to save and add a list of items to a file based on the type (e.g. Weapon.json). These files live in a new ToyBox folder that in the same folder that contains your saved games
Strings.Interesting NPCs in the local area: Interesting NPCs in the local area
Strings.Kineticist: Allow Gather Power Without H: Kineticist: Allow Gather Power Without Hands
Strings.Lets you open up the area's mass loot sc: Lets you open up the area's mass loot screen to grab goodies whenever you want. Normally shown only when you exit the area
Strings.Lets you open up your player storage che: Lets you open up your player storage chest that you find near your bed at the Inn and other places
Strings.Log ToyBox Keyboard Commands In Game: Log ToyBox Keyboard Commands In Game
Strings.Make game continue to play music on lost: Make game continue to play music on lost focus
Strings.Make sure you have auto-fill turned off: Make sure you have auto-fill turned off in settings or else this will just reset to default
Strings.Make tutorials not appear if disabled in: Make tutorials not appear if disabled in settings
Strings.Makes alignment shifts towards pure good: Makes alignment shifts towards pure good/evil/lawful/chaotic only shift on those axes
Strings.Makes mouse zoom work for the local map: Makes mouse zoom work for the local map (cities, dungeons, etc). Game restart required if you turn it off
Strings.Makes mouse zoom works for the local map: Makes mouse zoom works for the local map (cities, dungeons, etc). Game restart required if you turn it off
Strings.Maximize the ModManager window for best: Maximize the ModManager window for best ToyBox user experience
Strings.Merging your mythic spellbook will cause: Merging your mythic spellbook will cause you to transfer all mythic spells to your normal spellbook and gain caster levels equal to your mythic level. You will then be able to re-select spells on next level up or mythic level up. Merging a second mythic spellbook will transfer the spells but not increase your caster level further.  If you want more CL then increase it below.
Strings.Minimum Rarity For Loot Rarity Tags/Colo: Minimum Rarity For Loot Rarity Tags/Colors
Multiplies build time by (1 + modifier). -1 will make new buildings instant.
Strings.Multiplies crusade card resolution time: Multiplies crusade card resolution time by (1 + modifier). -1 will make things as fast as possible (minimum 1 day to avoid possible bugs)
Strings.Name: Name
Strings.Name of the new Custom Portrait:: Name of the new Custom Portrait:
Strings.Need Armies To Add All Current Units: Need Armies To Add All Current Units
Strings.Not available in the Main Menu: Not available in the Main Menu
Strings.Only available at Mythic level 8 or high: Only available at Mythic level 8 or higher
Strings.Only show languages with existing locali: Only show languages with existing localization files
Strings.Overwrite Default Game Build Points for: Overwrite Default Game Build Points for Mercenaries
Overwrite Default Game Build Points for Players
Pick size modifier to overwrite default.
Strings.Please rest after adjusting to recalcula: Please rest after adjusting to recalculate your spell slots.
Strings.Prevents dumb companions (that's you Gre: Prevents dumb companions (that's you Greybor) from wiping the party by running running into the dragon room and dying...
Strings.Prevents you from advancing all other My: Prevents you from advancing all other Mythic Path
Strings.Prevents you from advancing in Aeon or A: Prevents you from advancing in Aeon or Azata
Strings.Randomize NPC Responses To Dialog Choice: Randomize NPC Responses To Dialog Choices
Strings.Refill consumables in belt slots if in i: Refill consumables in belt slots if in inventory
Strings.Ride Any Unit As Your Mount: Ride Any Unit As Your Mount
Strings.See Party Editor for more fine grained a: See Party Editor for more fine grained alignment locking per character
Strings.Selected features revived from Xenofell': Selected features revived from Xenofell's excellent mod
Strings.Show a list of NPCs that may have quest: Show a list of NPCs that may have quest objectives or other interesting features <color=yellow>(Warning: Spoilers)</color>
Strings.Show all spell levels by default: Show all spell levels by default
Strings.Show level of the spell when the spellbo: Show level of the spell when the spellbook is showing all spell levels
Strings.Show reasons you can not equip an item i: Show reasons you can not equip an item in tooltips
Strings.Show the empty grey metamagic circles ab: Show the empty grey metamagic circles above spells
Strings.Shows all chests/bags/etc on the map exc: Shows all chests/bags/etc on the map excluding hidden
Strings.Shows all chests/bags/etc on the map inc: Shows all chests/bags/etc on the map including hidden
Strings.Shows unlocked Inevitable Excess DLC rew: Shows unlocked Inevitable Excess DLC rewards on the map
Strings.Some items might be invisible until loot: Some items might be invisible until looted
Strings.Some players find spiders and other swar: Some players find spiders and other swarms icky. This replaces them with something more pleasant
Strings.Some responses such as comments about yo: Some responses such as comments about your mythic powers will always choose the first one by default. This will show a copy of the answer and the condition for each possible response that an NPC might make to you based on
Strings.Speeds up or slows down the entire game: Speeds up or slows down the entire game (movement, animation, everything)
Strings.Strip HTML (colors) from Logs Tab in Uni: Strip HTML (colors) from Logs Tab in Unity Mod Manager
Strings.The following skill check adjustments ap: The following skill check adjustments apply only out of combat
Strings.This <b>incredibly dangerous</b> setting: This incredibly dangerous setting overrides the default behavior of failing to load saves depending on missing blueprint mods. This desperate action can potentially enable you to recover your saved game, though you'll have to respec at minimum.
Strings.This allows characters you control to mo: This allows characters you control to move through the selected category of units during combat
Strings.This allows you to adjust pitch (Camera: This allows you to adjust pitch (Camera Tilt) by holding down Mouse3 (which previously just rotated)
Strings.This allows you to play with the origina: This allows you to play with the originally released Unfair difficulty.
Strings.This allows you to select a given featur: This allows you to select a given feature more than once at level up
Strings.This allows you to select combinations o: This allows you to select combinations of archetypes when selecting a class for the first time that contain distinct spellbooks
Strings.This also includes companions who left t: This also includes companions who left the party such as Wenduag if you picked Lann
Strings.This applies the Trickster Lore Nature E: This applies the Trickster Lore Nature Enchantment Bonus at stage 1/2/3 respectively
Strings.This directly changes your character lev: This directly changes your character level but will not change exp or adjust any features associated with your character. To do a normal level up use +1 Lvl above.  This gets recalculated when you reload the game.
Strings.This directly changes your mythic level: This directly changes your mythic level but will not adjust any features associated with your character. To do a normal mythic level up use +1 my above
Strings.this flag lets you not count this class: this flag lets you not count this class in computing character level
Strings.This hides map pins of loot containers c: This hides map pins of loot containers containing at most the selected rarity. <color=orange>Note: Changing settings requires reopening the map.</color>
Strings.This increases your Swarm Power by the p: This increases your Swarm Power by the provided value.
Strings.This is intended for you to be able to e: This is intended for you to be able to enjoy the game while using mods that enhance your quality of life.  Please be mindful of the player community and avoid using this mod to trivialize earning prestige achievements like Sadistic Gamer. The author is in discussion with Owlcat about reducing the scope of achievement blocking to just these. Let's show them that we as players can mod and cheat responsibly.
Strings.This makes loot function like Diablo or: This makes loot function like Diablo or Borderlands. <color=orange>Note: turning this off requires you to save and reload for it to take effect.</color>
Strings.This resets all the skill check rolls fo: This resets all the skill check rolls for all interactable objects in the area
Strings.This sets your experience to match the c: This sets your experience to match the current value of character level
Strings.This sets your mythic experience to matc: This sets your mythic experience to match the current value of mythic level. Note that mythic experience is 1 point per level
Strings.This turns on the developer console whic: This turns on the developer console which lets you access cheat commands, shows a FPS window (hide with F11), etc. Warning: You may need to restart the game for this to fully take effect
Strings.This will change the color of NPC names: This will change the color of NPC names on the highlight makers and change the color map markers to indicate that they have interesting or conditional interactions
This will change the color of NPC names on the highlike makers and change the color map markers to indicate that they have interesting or conditional interactions
Strings.this will remove your old Allow Level Pa: this will remove your old Allow Level Past 20 flags from ToyBox settings but does not affect any other saves that have already migrated them
Strings.this will remove your old gestalt flags: this will remove your old gestalt flags from ToyBox settings but does not affect any other saves that have already migrated them
Strings.this will remove your old multiclass set: this will remove your old multiclass settings from ToyBox settings but does not affect any other saves that have already migrated them
Strings.This will set options below to enable yo: This will set options below to enable you to choose mythics more freely for both you, companions and even pets Note: this will also ignore other class restrictions for non mythic
Strings.Tick this to let your character exceed t: Tick this to let your character exceed the level 20 level cap like the Legend mythic path
Strings.To permanently remove these modded bluep: To permanently remove these modded blueprint dependencies, load the damaged saved game, change areas, and then save the game. You can then respec any characters that were impacted.
Strings.to select this class you must unselect a: to select this class you must unselect at least one of your other existing classes
Strings.ToyBox Archeologists can tag confusing p: ToyBox Archeologists can tag confusing puzzle pieces with green numbers in the game world and for inventory tool tips it will show text like this: [PuzzlePiece Green3x1] NOTE: Needs game restart to take efect
Strings.ToyBox has limited functionality from th: ToyBox has limited functionality from the main menu
Strings.Unlock mythic paths besides Legend and D: Unlock mythic paths besides Legend and Devil which block progression
Strings.Various spellbook enhancements revived f: Various spellbook enhancements revived from Xenofell's excellent mod
Strings.Warning! Using these might break your ga: Warning! Using these might break your game somehow. Recommend for experimental tinkering like trying out different builds, and not for actually playing the game.
Strings.Warning: This is irreversible. Please sa: Warning: This is irreversible. Please save before continuing!
Strings.When enabled and you hold down the camer: When enabled and you hold down the camera follow key (usually f) the camera will keep following the unit until you release it
Strings.When ticked this shows ToyBox commands i: When ticked this shows ToyBox commands in the combat log which is helpful for you to know when you used the shortcut
Strings.When ticked, this keeps your search acti:
When ticked, this keeps your search active when you click to dismiss the Search Bar. This allows you to apply the search to different item categories.
<color=orange>Untick this if you wish for the standard game behavior where it clears your search</color>
Strings.When you get standalone mythic spellbook: When you get standalone mythic spellbooks you can merge them here by select.
Strings.Witch/Shaman: Cackling/Shanting Extends: Witch/Shaman: Cackling/Shanting Extends Hexes By 10 Min (Out Of Combat)
Strings.You can enable hot keys to teleport memb: You can enable hot keys to teleport members of your party to your mouse cursor on Area or the Global Map
Strings.You must unlock the crusade before you c: You must unlock the crusade before you can access these toys.
Strings.You should be on the global map and have: You should be on the global map and have the Crusade active
